dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.resource.res.log.os.OperatingSystem
dataStructure.description:
An OperatingSystem is a concrete entity that represents either software and/or firmware that runs the LogicalResource. This entity implements and/or manages the resources, tasks, file systems, security, and data available on the LogicalResource. Note that an OperatingSystem is distinct from software applications that are run on the Resource. All aplications and software must communicate with the OperatingSystem for all operations that they need.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: OperatingSystem

child.name: dateValue
child.description:
This attribute contains the value of the current date.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: dateValue

child.name: timeValue
child.description:
This attribute contains the value of the current Time.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: timeValue

child.name: isUTCTime
child.description:
This is a Boolean attribute that, if TRUE, means that this OperatingSystem instance uses absolute (or UTC) time. If FALSE, then it uses LOCAL time.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: isUTCTime

child.name: numberProcessActiveTotal
child.description:
This is an integer attribute that defines the maximum number of total processes that this OperatingSystem instance can support at any given time.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: numberProcessActiveTotal

child.name: numberProcessesActiveCurrent
child.description:
This is an integer attribute that defines the current number of total processes that this OperatingSystem instance can support at any given time.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: numberProcessesActiveCurrent

child.name: swapSpaceAvailableTotal
child.description:
This defines the total swap space available in Kbytes. If this OperatingSystem instance doesn't distinguish swap space from space used for paging files, then the value of this attribute should be 0.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: swapSpaceAvailableTotal

child.name: swapSpaceUsedCurrent
child.description:
This defines the current swap space in Kbytes that is being used. If this OperatingSystem instance doesn't distinguish swap space from space used for paging files, then the value of this attribute should be 0.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: swapSpaceUsedCurrent

child.name: virtualMemorySpaceTotal
child.description:
This defines the number of Kbytes of virtual memory that can be used by this particular OperatingSystem instance. This is usually the amount of total RAM plus the amount of paging space.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: virtualMemorySpaceTotal

child.name: virtualMemorySpaceUsedCurrent
child.description:
This defines the number of Kbytes of virtual memory that is currently being used by this particular OperatingSystem instance.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: virtualMemorySpaceUsedCurrent

child.name: physicalMemoryTotal
child.description:
This defines the number of Kbytes of physical memory that this particular OperatingSystem instance can use.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: physicalMemoryTotal

child.name: physicalMemoryAvailableCurrent
child.description:
This defines the number of Kbytes of physical memory that are currently available for this particular OperatingSystem instance to use.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: physicalMemoryAvailableCurrent

child.name: pagingFileSizeTotal
child.description:
This defines the total number of KBytes that can be stored in the paging files of this particular OperatingSystem instance. If this instance doesn't support paging files, then the value of this attribute should be 0.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: pagingFileSizeTotal

child.name: pagingFileSizeCurrent
child.description:
This defines the current number of KBytes that are stored in the paging files of this particular OperatingSystem instance. If this instance doesn't support paging files, then the value of this attribute should be 0.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: pagingFileSizeCurrent

child.name: processMemorySizeMax
child.description:
This defines the maximum number of Kbytes of memory that can be allocated to a Process. For Operating Systems with no virtual memory, this value is typically equal to the total amount of physical Memory minus memory used by the BIOS and OS.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: processMemorySizeMax

child.name: processMemorySizeCurrent
child.description:
This defines the current number of Kbytes of memory that have been allocated to a Process.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: processMemorySizeCurrent

child.name: isDistributable
child.description:
This is a Boolean attribute that, if TRUE, designates this OperatingSystem instance as being able to be distributed across multiple physically distinct Resources.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: isDistributable

child.name: isDistributedCurrent
child.description:
This is a Boolean attribute that, if TRUE, defines this OperatingSystem instance as being currently distributed across several Resource nodes.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: isDistributedCurrent

child.name: numUsersCurrent
child.description:
This is a non-negative integer that defines the current number of users of this OperatingSystem instance.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: numUsersCurrent

child.name: numUsersMax
child.description:
This is a non-negative integer that defines the maximum number of users of this OperatingSystem instance.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: numUsersMax

child.name: categoryOfOS
child.description:
This is an enumerated integer that defines the category that this OperatingSystem resides in. Values include: 0: Custom (i.e., a mix of categories) 1: Server (e.g., Unix, Windows) 2: Language-Based (e.g., Java) 3: NetworkDevice (e.g., Cisco IOS, Juniper Junos) 4: Host (e.g., a Laptop or PDA) 5: Other

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: categoryOfOS

child.name: lastBootTime
child.description:
This is a TimeStamp that defines the last time that this OperatingSystem instance was booted. A TimeStamp is a complex attribute that contains a Date and a Time.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: lastBootTime

child.name: commonPlatformEnumeration
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association OSIdentifiedByCPEName

This association end is optional
child.label: commonPlatformEnumeration

child.name: language
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association OSBuiltForLanguage

This association end is optional
child.label: language

child.name: partyRole1
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association PartyRoleLicenseOSDetails

This association end is optional
child.label: partyRole1

child.name: partyRole
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association PartyRoleUsesProcessesDetails

This association end is optional
child.label: partyRole

child.name: logicalDevice
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association LogicalDeviceOSInteractionDetails

This association end is optional
child.label: logicalDevice

child.name: software
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association SoftwareOSInteractionDetails

This association end is optional
child.label: software
